entry.tran: 感到厌倦的；感到厌烦的
entry.def: If you are bored, you feel tired and impatient because you have lost interest in something or because you have nothing to do.

example.ex: I am getting very bored with this entire business.
example.tran: 我开始对这整件事情感到非常厌倦。

sentences.sentence: "strolled through the museum with a bored air"

means.word_mean: 2. uninterested because of frequent exposure or indulgence;

sentences.sentence: "the bored gaze of the successful film star"

means.word_mean: 无聊的, 无趣的, 烦人的，厌倦的，烦闷的

sentences.en: Bored youths hang around outside looking for trouble.
sentences.cn: 百无聊赖的年轻人在外面到处寻衅滋事。

sentences.en: After a while, I began to get bored with my job.
sentences.cn: 过了一段时间，我开始厌烦这份工作。

sentences.en: After listening to the speech for three hours I was bored stiff.
sentences.cn: 听了三个小时的演讲,我厌烦透了。
